leadership.name: Priya Sharma
leadership.bio: Priya has over 20 years of experience in the tech industry, with a passion for building innovative products and high-performing teams.

leadership.name: Rohan Mehta
leadership.bio: Rohan is the technical visionary behind our platform, ensuring we stay at the forefront of technology and innovation.

leadership.name: Anjali Verma
leadership.bio: Anjali leads the product team with a user-centric approach, translating customer needs into impactful features.

leadership.name: Vikram Singh
leadership.bio: Vikram is dedicated to creating a thriving and inclusive workplace where every team member can grow and succeed.
